Contact Us

Aricosa

Aricosa is a consultancy specializing in the right technical solutions. Our goal is to implement systems that people actually want to use and enjoy interacting with. Although the main focus is technology, our commitment to quality starts with customer service.

http://aricosa.com/

What we did for Aricosa:

Flatterline developed an API around an existing application for one of Aricosa's clients. The API was then used by a variety of 3rd party applications, including mobile applications and embeddable web widgets. Additionally, we developed a Twilio telephony application that used the API to provide an interface via an 800 number.

What Aricosa had to say about Flatterline:

Flatterline was extremely easy to work with and professional in all our interactions.

  1. Great communication at all stages of the project
  2. Strong technical knowledge but the ability to communicate to all levels of the organization
  3. Fast - our work was delivered on time

    4. Erica Lucci, Project Manager
